name: AnukiTalk
_source: s;Anuki;Do you really think this was a trap?|That this was intentional?
s;Simon;It seems likely.{w} The suddeness of the request...|What we found in the ruins...
s;Anuki;I've been trying to shake those thoughts, but I can't.|After what happened to Roland too...
s;Simon;It's a pattern.{w} Anuki, I don't think-
s;Anuki;He can't be trusted! My own damn father!
s;Simon;It can't be easy to hear.
s;Anuki;It isn't easy to realize, Simon!
s;Anuki;When we were traveling to Troy, my father asked if I was with child.
s;Anuki;No.{w} He seemed ambivalent towards my answer, but...
s;Simon;Perhaps he was hoping to hear a yes.
s;Anuki;I am not his pawn. Neither are you.|When we confront him, I'll be at your side, Simon.
s;Simon;Thank you.{w} I don't want this to come to bloodshed.
s;Anuki;Neither do I. But we deserve an explanation.|And I'll make sure he gives one.
s;Anuki;I think that... I think...|Simon, he is my father.|I can't believe that he wanted this.|I just won't accept it.
s;Simon;I understand your hesitation, but isn't it suspicious?
s;Anuki;Shut up.{w} Just shut up.|I don't care.|He's my father.{w} I won't turn against him.|You haven't earned that trust.
